seo.ogTitle: About diBoaS | Built to Fix What Banks Keep Hidden
seo.ogDescription: diBoaS was founded to give everyone access to real returns. Learn the story of why Breno is building this platform.

story.paragraph1: I'm Breno, and I'm building diBoaS because of my grandmother.
story.paragraph2: She lived in Rio de Janeiro her whole life. She taught me to save. She said I should try to save half of everything I earn. She tried that herself. Her whole life.
story.paragraph3: Work hard. Buy only the basics. Try to save.
story.revelation: Here's what no one told her: Her bank paid her 0.5% interest while earning 7% with her money.
story.example: Think about it. That €1,000 you saved? The bank made €70 with it and gave you €5 back. The other €65? That was supposed to be yours.
story.universal: The same bank is doing that with all of us.
story.turning: In 2024, I lost my job and I decided to do something about this problem.

whatWeDo.description: diBoaS connects you to trusted financial protocols, the same ones banks and institutions use to grow their money. The difference? Now those returns go to you, not them.
whatWeDo.noMiddleman: No middleman keeping the difference. No mystery about where your money goes. Just transparent access to 6-10% annually on stablecoins, with the ability to withdraw anytime.

money.title: Your money should work for you.
money.description: The concept of earning returns on money has existed for over 5,000 years. For most of that time, only the wealthy had access to the best rates. We're changing that.

honesty.title: Honesty over hype.
honesty.description: We don't promise guaranteed returns because nobody can. What we do offer: real data from 4 years of historical analysis, clear explanations of how each strategy works, and a Learn Center to help you understand what you're doing before you do it.

startSmall.title: Start small, learn as you go.
startSmall.description: You don't need €10,000 to begin. Start with what you're comfortable with. Watch how it works. Then decide if it's right for you.

mission.statement: To give regular people access to the same financial opportunities that were previously reserved for institutions and the wealthy.
mission.tagline: One platform. Real returns. Your money, your control.

business.description: If you're a founder, CFO, or treasury manager, the same system that failed my grandmother is sitting on your company's cash reserves.
business.pitch: We built diBoaS Treasury for businesses that want their idle cash to work harder, with same-day liquidity and institutional-grade protocols.
